Name: Roman Mythology: Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['books and literature', 'art and entertainment', 'mythology']
Description: This lesson deals with Roman mythology, examining the sources of the gods and myths, the purposes of the mythology and the role it played in the lives of the Roman people.
